messages.title: Election Special
messages.content: Thursday 8th June, the best choice as your MP

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bring about Mims' plans to deliver better local infrastructure, holding the Local Lib Dems to account for failure to provide a Local Plan, manage Brexit for the local area, economic stability with job creation and low unemployment.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Mims Protecting Green Spaces and Ancient Woodland
keyPolicies.policyDescription: As MP, Mims will fight for enhanced environmental protections and plans to oppose unnecessary development on green spaces and ancient woodland.

issues.brexitEurope: Managing Brexit for the local area
issues.economy: Strong and stable economy with 2.9 million new jobs, 3.1% rise for 31 million people, record low unemployment
issues.environment: Protecting green spaces and ancient woodland
issues.health: Lib Dems vote against health funding for elderly and vulnerable
issues.transport: Bring the transport infrastructure needed to alleviate congestion

community.content: Holding the Local Lib Dems to account for their failure to provide a Local Plan resulting in uncontrolled housing development on green spaces.

politicalExperience.achievements: Bringing investment in local transport infrastructure and air quality improvement

quotes.text: Eastleigh Borough Council criticised by Chris Grayling in House of Commons
Lib Dem Scrooge: Families have to pay £1.53 for a letter that arrives with no stamp... only to find it's their MP's Christmas Card

examples: Mims protecting green spaces and ancient woodland
Lib Dems to account for their failure to provide a Local Plan
Health funding for elderly and vulnerable

personalStories.story: Mims has been working hard over the last two years as your MP to bring the Eastleigh Constituency the transport infrastructure that we need to alleviate congestion and improve air quality – issues that have been ignored for many years by successive Lib Dem MPs.

examples: Eastleigh Borough Council face backlash against budget cuts and borrowing
